body: 考虑一台机器可能起了多个zk，节点冲突了
@chickenlj Done

好的。不过这样还是会有一些限制。
一般的情况还要定义一个字段用来接收数据，如果有业务代码异常，则将其返回null。
比如
`{"code":"500","errMsg":"xxx","data":null}`

这样定义DTO的时侯，就不能将data字段映射成数组等类型，否则遇到null的时候仍然会invoke失败。
这个issue修复了吗？
这个线程池实际参考的是Tomcat的线程池设计，详见：tomcat源码中org.apache.tomcat.util.threads包下的ThreadPoolExecutor和TaskQueue。

I think this is most likely to be a problem caused by `-Djava.ext.dirs`. Maybe you can follow what @foreveryang321 suggests.

Also, we don't recommend using the `embedded JSON implementation`

Good idea, i have some basic questions here:
* Will all the configuration registered to registry and passed to consumer? 
* Caches only at consumer and no caches at provider?
Would you like to make a contribution and make a pull request?
What control rules do you use, Could you describe your question in more detail?
You must have more than one dubbo applications in your machine. You can avoid this by [specify another port explicitly](http://dubbo.io/books/dubbo-user-book/references/qos.html).

@chickenlj 1，缓存配置注册到zookeeper(目前仅支持zookeeper作为注册中心)，Consumer启动时获取缓存配置信息，运行过程中如Provider有变更，会同步到Consumer。
2，缓存的get，delete操作都是在Consumer端，Provider仅提供配置。

@Reference can be used in Controller, please check your `@DubboComponentScan` configuration.
[examples](https://github.com/alibaba/dubbo/tree/master/dubbo-test/dubbo-test-examples/src/main/java/com/alibaba/dubbo/examples/annotation)
@skykong1981  Can you give a typical provider url example when use the above cache configuration?
I have transfer this transferred this part to a separate project. Now i am sure we won't face this problem.
This feature should be supported, we can figure out a better solution.
I think it will be more reasonable to return a RpcResult.
@chickenlj 不知道你说的typical provider url是什么意思，是在zookeeper里面的 /dubbo/com.xxx.TestService/providers 里展示的节点url？我没有把缓存配置写在这个url里，而是写在了这个node的data里。

I am providing a Service-SDK to our partner, and it requires a dynamic version specified by the partner's application. The best way is to provide the version via properties.

`@com.alibaba.dubbo.config.annotation.Service(version = "${service.version}")`

but it will fail and report:
`Caused by: java.lang.IllegalStateException: Invalid version="${service.version}" contain illegal charactor, only digit, letter, '-', '_' and '.' is legal.`

遇到同样的问题，某些Service事务一直失效，跟进去对比发现无事务的服务调用字节码处理直接略过了spring事务相关的aop。
看到你的备用方案改成xml配置解决。
给你点个赞！
-------
看到有人在追问xml配置怎么加，我顺便贴一下(spring-boot)：
doubb-provider.xml

```
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<beans xmlns="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans"
       xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:dubbo="http://code.alibabatech.com/schema/dubbo"
       xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans/spring-beans.xsd
	http://code.alibabatech.com/schema/dubbo         http://code.alibabatech.com/schema/dubbo/dubbo.xsd">
    <!-- 声明需要暴露的服务接口 -->
    <dubbo:service interface="接口"
                   ref="spring bean" protocol="dubbo" timeout="3000" retries="0" version="版本"/>
</beans>
```


App.java增加注解(启动入口)


```
@ImportResource({"classpath:dubbo-provider.xml"})
```
